description: This file implements backend APIs for managing IPv6 Relay Device (IPv6RD) configurations in a broadband device, including creation, initialization, registration, updating, and deletion of IPv6RD interface objects, as well as interacting with a configuration repository.

classes.name: COSA_DATAMODEL_IPV6RD
classes.description: Data model representing the IPv6RD configuration, including enabled status, interface list, and management functions.

classes.name: COSA_DML_IPV6RD_IF
classes.description: Data model for an IPv6RD interface entry, holding instance number, alias, and other interface-specific attributes.

classes.name: COSA_CONTEXT_LINK_OBJECT
classes.description: Context object tying an interface entry to the configuration system, tracking instance number, context handle, and folder references.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CosaIPv6rdCreate(VOID)
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new IPv6RD data model object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaIPv6rdInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the IPv6RD data model, loads existing interface configurations, and sets up internal data structures.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaIPv6rdRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cleans up and deallocates resources associated with the IPv6RD data model.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaIPv6rdIfRegGetInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Reads interface configuration data from the repository and populates internal lists.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaIPv6rdIfRegAddInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Adds new interface configuration data to the repository.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaIPv6rdIfRegDelInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Removes interface configuration data from the repository.
